name: Painter Script Library
summary: Learn about .SCRIPTLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Painter comes with various features to assist you in illustrating artwork and editing digital photographs. When you have tasks or functions you apply often, such as applying a pattern to an image or adding multiple shapes to a canvas, you can save them as a Painter script (saved as a .TXT file). Then, you can export a collection of scripts as a SCRIPTLIBRARY file.
You can access a library of scripts through the "Scripts" panel in Painter. To access the scripts, select Window → Scripts.
NOTE: Corel replaced the .SCRIPTS format with the SCRIPTLIBRARY format.

description: A SCRIPTLIBRARY file contains a collection of scripts created by Corel Painter, an illustration and image-editing application. Painter users create scripts to perform common, repeatable tasks, and export and import them in SCRIPTLIBRARY files to preserve or share scripts.

instructions: You can open a SCRIPTLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to import a SCRIPTLIBRARY file, select Window → Scripts, click the hamburger icon, then select Import Script Library.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .scriptlibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
images.caption: SCRIPTLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023
